channel.title: bar camp on Gabe Kangas
channel.description: Recent content in bar camp on Gabe Kangas

item.title: Barcamp Omaha 2010 was rad (and the jam was fun)
item.description: {.aligncenter width=“640” height=“360”}Thanks to the organization team of Barcamp2010 here in Omaha it was another great event. Learned some stuff and had some fun. Also thanks to everyone to indulged me in my attempt for a lunchtime jam session. I can't honestly say it was the most musical thing ever performed, but we all had fun anyway :) Thanks to everyone who took part! It was nice to mix things up a bit.

item.title: Gabe Kangas Association for Awesome is proud to sponsor Omaha Bar Camp 2009
item.description: {width=“170” height=“170”} The Gabe Kangas Association for Awesome (GKAFA) is proud to announce they will be sponsoring this year's Omaha Bar Camp. As you may know The Gabe Kangas Association for Awesome is the branch of Gabe Kangas who's goal is to spread awesome both in local and remote markets.Â When the opportunity arose to take part this year team awesome jumped at the opportunity. GKAFA has a long history of spreading awesome via sponsorships.
